item.description: After meeting at Trident, we'll be walking over to 448 Beacon Street, the Church of Scientology of Boston. I've confirmed that their Sunday services are still public. We'll be attending the 11 AM session, and will have a chance to see what their form of worship is like. Afterwards, there will likely be a chance to ask questions of Scientologists, and to learn more about auditing and the methods of Dianetics. Any question? Call me at 617-935-4951.
item.name: A Field Trip to the Church of Scientology
